title: Merck Adult Vaccination Program (MAVP) for Pharmacists | MerckVaccines.com
description: Pharmacists may find resources for starting an adult vaccination program in their pharmacy, as well as key pharmacy industry events.
cleaned_text: Merck Adult Vaccination Program Taking Patient Care to the Next Level Pharmacists can play an important role in helping protect patients from vaccine-preventable diseases. The Merck Adult Vaccination Program can assist your vaccination efforts. This section contains information intended for health care professionals in the United States only and is not intended for the general public.
